title: Configure Lab DC
description: Performs base configurations on DC: creates a custom Startup shortcut for bginfo from Sysinternals (by Mark Russinovich). Uses a custom config file (.bgi) co-located with bginfo.exe. IMPORTANT: This requires that the Sysinternals Artifact has been run first! Then turns off IE advanced security, installs Active Directory Users and Computers snap-in, creates OU for joining lab VMs to, & creates an OU to sync with Azure AD.
